global_notes: Single baseline group G1. Surface matches results exactly. All 52 rows are in G1. Treatment variable alternatives (lynchcapitamob1910/1920/1930/lynchcapitasteve) are classified as core_data since the surface explicitly includes them in rc_spec_ids and the treatment concept ('historical lynching rate') is preserved. Outcome transforms (asinh, log1p) are classified as core_funcform per surface policy.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Cross-sectional OLS: Negative association between historical black lynching rate per capita (1882-1930) and contemporary black voter registration rate, with state FE and historical controls. Southern US counties.
baseline_groups.notes: Table 2 Col 1: Blackrate_regvoters ~ lynchcapitamob + 7 historical controls | State_FIPS. coef=-0.469, p=0.001, N=267. R2=0.548. Default OLS SEs (no robust/cluster).
